title: Intermittently when I make or receiv a phone call, it goes to the phone and not the Bluetooth hedset
content:
Headset paired and working properly.
intermittently when I make or receive all call, the call audio goes to the phone and not the headset.
This will also intermittently happen with Wireless Android Auto.
This will sometime happen when I have been making phone calls via the headset and the next call goes to the phone speaker.
Happens a few times a week.
has happened with other Bluetooth headsets as well.  Been happening for quite a while. Definitly didn't happen on Android 10
Thanks for your input.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
